alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 21 at 10:09AM PDT until September 21 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph below 7000 feet. Gusts up to 60 mph above 7000 feet. * WHERE...Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects or results in some trees blown down in the highest elevations. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few brief power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
